00050         m_windowFunc(create<XComboNode>("WindowFunc", false, true)),

00052         m_difFreq(create<XDoubleNode>("DIFFreq", false)),

00102         m_form->m_numPhaseAdv);

00104         m_form->m_ckbPNR);
00105     m_conPNRSolverList = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(pnrSolverList(),
00106         m_form->m_cmbPNRSolver);

00108         m_form->m_cmbSolver);

00110     m_conBGWidth = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(bgWidth(),
00111         m_form->m_edBGWidth);

00113         m_form->m_edFFTPos);

00117     m_conExtraAv = xqcon_create<XQSpinBoxConnector>(extraAvg(),

00128     m_conWindowWidth = xqcon_create<XKDoubleNumInputConnector>(windowWidth(),
00129         m_form->m_numWindowWidth);

00131         m_form->m_edDIFFreq);

00139 
00140     {

00155         waveGraph()->plot(2)->drawPoints()->value(false);

00157         waveGraph()->plot(2)->intensity()->value(0.3);

00166             "Abs. [V]", "Phase [deg]", "Dark. [V]" };
00167         ftWaveGraph()->setColCount(6, labels);
00168         ftWaveGraph()->insertPlot(labels[3], 0, 3);

00172         ftWaveGraph()->plot(0)->label()->value(i18n("abs."));

00174         ftWaveGraph()->plot(0)->drawLines()->value(true);
00175         ftWaveGraph()->plot(0)->drawPoints()->value(false);

00178         ftWaveGraph()->plot(1)->drawPoints()->value(false);

00181         ftWaveGraph()->plot(2)->drawBars()->value(false);
00182         ftWaveGraph()->plot(2)->drawLines()->value(true);
00183         ftWaveGraph()->plot(2)->lineColor()->value(QColor(0xa0, 0xa0, 0x00).rgb());
00184         ftWaveGraph()->plot(2)->drawPoints()->value(false);
00185         ftWaveGraph()->plot(2)->intensity()->value(0.5);
00186         ftWaveGraph()->clear();
00187         {
00188             shared_ptr<XXYPlot> plot = ftWaveGraph()->graph()->plots()->create<XXYPlot>(
00189                 "Peaks", true, ftWaveGraph()->graph());

00191             plot->label()->value(i18n("Peaks"));
00192             plot->axisX()->value(ftWaveGraph()->axisx());

00194             plot->drawPoints()->value(false);

00201             plot->clearPoints()->setUIEnabled(false);
00202             plot->maxCount()->setUIEnabled(false);
00203         }
00204     }
00205 
00206     m_lsnOnAvgClear = m_avgClear->onTouch().connectWeak(shared_from_this(), &XNMRPulseAnalyzer::onAvgClear);
00207     m_lsnOnSpectrumShow = m_spectrumShow->onTouch().connectWeak(shared_from_this(), &XNMRPulseAnalyzer::onSpectrumShow,
00208         XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL | XListener::FLAG_AVOID_DUP);
00209 
00210     m_lsnOnCondChanged = fromTrig()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(shared_from_this(), &XNMRPulseAnalyzer::onCondChanged);
00211     width()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00212     phaseAdv()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00213     usePNR()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00214     pnrSolverList()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00215     solverList()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00216     bgPos()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00217     bgWidth()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00218     fftPos()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00219     fftLen()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00220     //  extraAvg()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00221     exAvgIncr()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00222     numEcho()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00223     echoPeriod()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00224     windowFunc()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00225     windowWidth()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00226     difFreq()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);

00230 void XNMRPulseAnalyzer::onSpectrumShow(const shared_ptr<XNode> &) {
00231     m_spectrumForm->show();

00238 
00239 void XNMRPulseAnalyzer::backgroundSub(std::vector<std::complex<double> > &wave, 
00240     int pos, int length, int bgpos, int bglength) {
00241     std::complex<double> bg = 0;
00242     if (bglength) {
00243         double normalize = 0.0;
00244         for (int i = 0; i < bglength; i++) {
00245             double z = 1.0;
00246             if(!*usePNR())
00247                 z = FFT::windowFuncHamming( (double)i / bglength - 0.5);
00248             bg += z * wave[pos + i + bgpos];
00249             normalize += z;
00250         }
00251         bg /= normalize;
00252     }
00253 
00254     for (int i = 0; i < wave.size(); i++) {
00255         wave[i] -= bg;
00256     }
00257 
00258     shared_ptr<SpectrumSolver> solverPNR = m_solverPNR->solver();
00259     if (bglength) {
00260         if(*usePNR() && solverPNR) {
00261             int dnrlength = FFT::fitLength((bglength + bgpos) * 4);
00262             std::vector<std::complex<double> > memin(bglength), memout(dnrlength);
00263             for(unsigned int i = 0; i < bglength; i++) {
00264                 memin[i] = wave[pos + i + bgpos];
00265             }
00266             try {
00267                 solverPNR->exec(memin, memout, bgpos, 0.5e-2, &FFT::windowFuncRect, 1.0);
00268             }
00269             catch (XKameError &e) {
00270                 throw XSkippedRecordError(e.msg(), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00271             }
00272             int imax = std::min((int)wave.size() - pos, (int)memout.size());
00273             for(unsigned int i = 0; i < imax; i++) {
00274                 wave[i + pos] -= solverPNR->ifft()[i];
00275             }
00276         }
00277     }
00278 }
00279 void XNMRPulseAnalyzer::rotNFFT(int ftpos, double ph,
00280     std::vector<std::complex<double> > &wave,
00281     std::vector<std::complex<double> > &ftwave) {
00282     int length = wave.size();
00283     //phase advance
00284     std::complex<double> cph(std::polar(1.0, ph));
00285     for (int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
00286         wave[i] *= cph;
00287     }
00288 
00289     int fftlen = ftwave.size();
00290     //fft
00291     std::vector<std::complex<double> > fftout(fftlen);
00292     FFT::twindowfunc wndfunc = m_solver->windowFunc();
00293     double wndwidth = *windowWidth() / 100.0;
00294     try {
00295         m_solverRecorded->exec(wave, fftout, -ftpos, 0.3e-2, wndfunc, wndwidth);
00296     }
00297     catch (XKameError &e) {
00298         throw XSkippedRecordError(e.msg(), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00299     }
00300 
00301     std::copy(fftout.begin(), fftout.end(), ftwave.begin());
00302     
00303     if(m_solverRecorded->isFT()) {
00304         std::vector<double> weight;
00305         SpectrumSolver::window(length, -ftpos, wndfunc, wndwidth, weight);
00306         double w = 0;
00307         for(int i = 0; i < length; i++)
00308             w += weight[i] * weight[i];
00309         m_ftWavePSDCoeff = w/(double)length;
00310     }
00311     else {
00312         m_ftWavePSDCoeff = 1.0;
00313     }
00314 }
00315 void XNMRPulseAnalyzer::onAvgClear(const shared_ptr<XNode> &) {
00316     m_timeClearRequested = XTime::now();
00317     requestAnalysis();
00318 }
00319 void XNMRPulseAnalyzer::onCondChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &node) {
00320     if ((node == numEcho()) || (node == difFreq()))
00321         m_timeClearRequested = XTime::now();
00322     if (node == exAvgIncr())
00323         m_timeClearRequested = XTime::now();
00324     if (node == exAvgIncr())
00325         extraAvg()->value(0);
00326     requestAnalysis();
00327 }
00328 bool XNMRPulseAnalyzer::checkDependency(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &emitter) const {
00329     const shared_ptr<XPulser> _pulser = *pulser();
00330     if (emitter == _pulser)
00331         return false;
00332     const shared_ptr<XDSO> _dso = *dso();
00333     if (!_dso)
00334         return false;
00335     //    //Request for clear.
00336     //    if(m_timeClearRequested > _dso->timeAwared()) return true;
00337     //    if(_pulser && (_dso->timeAwared() < _pulser->time())) return false;
00338     return true;
00339 }
00340 void XNMRPulseAnalyzer::analyze(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &emitter)
00341     throw (XRecordError&) {
00342     const shared_ptr<XDSO> _dso = *dso();
00343     ASSERT(_dso);
00344     ASSERT(_dso->time() );
00345 
00346     if (_dso->numChannelsRecorded() < 1) {
00347         throw XSkippedRecordError(i18n("No record in DSO"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00348     }
00349     if (_dso->numChannelsRecorded() < 2) {
00350         throw XSkippedRecordError(i18n("Two channels needed in DSO"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00351     }
00352 
00353     double interval = _dso->timeIntervalRecorded();
00354     if (interval <= 0) {
00355         throw XSkippedRecordError(i18n("Invalid time interval in waveforms."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00356     }
00357     int pos = lrint(*fromTrig() *1e-3 / interval + _dso->trigPosRecorded());
00358     double starttime = (pos - _dso->trigPosRecorded()) * interval;
00359     if (pos >= (int)_dso->lengthRecorded()) {
00360         throw XSkippedRecordError(i18n("Position beyond waveforms."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00361     }
00362     if (pos < 0) {
00363         throw XSkippedRecordError(i18n("Position beyond waveforms."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00364     }
00365     int length = lrint(*width() / 1000 / interval);
00366     if (pos + length >= (int)_dso->lengthRecorded()) {
00367         throw XSkippedRecordError(i18n("Invalid length."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00368     }
00369     if (length <= 0) {
00370         throw XSkippedRecordError(i18n("Invalid length."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00371     }
00372     
00373     int bgpos = lrint((*bgPos() - *fromTrig()) / 1000 / interval);
00374     if(pos + bgpos >= (int)_dso->lengthRecorded()) {
00375         throw XSkippedRecordError(i18n("Position for BG. sub. beyond waveforms."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00376     }
00377     if(bgpos < 0) {
00378         throw XSkippedRecordError(i18n("Position for BG. sub. beyond waveforms."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00379     }
00380     int bglength = lrint(*bgWidth() / 1000 / interval);
00381     if(pos + bgpos + bglength >= (int)_dso->lengthRecorded()) {
00382         throw XSkippedRecordError(i18n("Invalid Length for BG. sub."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00383     }
00384     if(bglength < 0) {
00385         throw XSkippedRecordError(i18n("Invalid Length for BG. sub."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00386     }
00387 
00388     shared_ptr<XPulser> _pulser(*pulser());
00389     
00390     int echoperiod = lrint(*echoPeriod() / 1000 /interval);
00391     int numechoes = *numEcho();
00392     numechoes = std::max(1, numechoes);
00393     bool bg_after_last_echo = (echoperiod < bgpos + bglength);
00394 
00395     if(bglength && (bglength < length * (bg_after_last_echo ? numechoes : 1) * 3))
00396         m_statusPrinter->printWarning(i18n("Maybe, length for BG. sub. is too short."));
00397     
00398     if((bgpos < length + (bg_after_last_echo ? (echoperiod * (numechoes - 1)) : 0)) 
00399         && (bgpos + bglength > 0))
00400         m_statusPrinter->printWarning(i18n("Maybe, position for BG. sub. is overrapped against echoes"), true);
00401 
00402     if(numechoes > 1) {
00403         if(pos + echoperiod * (numechoes - 1) + length >= (int)_dso->lengthRecorded()) {
00404             throw XSkippedRecordError(i18n("Invalid Multiecho settings."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00405         }
00406         if(echoperiod < length) {
00407             throw XSkippedRecordError(i18n("Invalid Multiecho settings."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00408         }
00409         if(!bg_after_last_echo) {
00410             if(bgpos + bglength > echoperiod) {
00411                 throw XSkippedRecordError(i18n("Invalid Multiecho settings."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00412             }
00413             if(pos + echoperiod * (numechoes - 1) + bgpos + bglength >= (int)_dso->lengthRecorded()) {
00414                 throw XSkippedRecordError(i18n("Invalid Multiecho settings."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00415             }
00416         }
00417         if(_pulser) {
00418             if((numechoes > *_pulser->echoNum()) ||
00419                 (fabs(*echoPeriod()*1e3 / (*_pulser->tau()*2.0) - 1.0) > 1e-4)) {
00420                 m_statusPrinter->printWarning(i18n("Invalid Multiecho settings."), true);
00421             }
00422         }
00423     }
00424 
00425     if((m_startTime != starttime) || (length != m_waveWidth)) {
00426         double t = length * interval * 1e3;
00427         m_waveGraph->axisx()->autoScale()->value(false);
00428         m_waveGraph->axisx()->minValue()->value(starttime * 1e3 - t * 0.3);
00429         m_waveGraph->axisx()->maxValue()->value(starttime * 1e3 + t * 1.3);
00430     }
00431     m_waveWidth = length;
00432     bool skip = (m_timeClearRequested > _dso->timeAwared());
00433     bool avgclear = skip;
00434 
00435     if(interval != m_interval) {
00436         //[sec]
00437         m_interval = interval;
00438         avgclear = true;
00439     }
00440     if(m_startTime != starttime) {
00441         //[sec]
00442         m_startTime = starttime;
00443         avgclear = true;
00444     }
00445     
00446     if (length > (int)m_waveSum.size()) {
00447         avgclear = true;
00448     }
00449     m_wave.resize(length);
00450     m_waveSum.resize(length);
00451     int fftlen = FFT::fitLength(*fftLen());
00452     if(fftlen != m_darkPSD.size()) {
00453         avgclear = true;        
00454     }
00455     m_darkPSD.resize(fftlen);
00456     m_darkPSDSum.resize(fftlen);
00457     std::fill(m_wave.begin(), m_wave.end(), 0.0);
00458 
00459     // Phase Inversion Cycling
00460     bool picenabled = *m_picEnabled;
00461     bool inverted = false;
00462     if (picenabled && (!_pulser || !_pulser->time())) {
00463         picenabled = false;
00464         gErrPrint(getLabel() + ": " + i18n("No active pulser!"));
00465     }
00466     if (_pulser) {
00467         inverted = _pulser->invertPhaseRecorded();
00468     }
00469 
00470     int avgnum = std::max((unsigned int)*extraAvg(), 1u) * (picenabled ? 2 : 1);
00471     
00472     if (!*exAvgIncr() && (avgnum <= m_avcount)) {
00473         avgclear = true;
00474     }
00475     if (avgclear) {
00476         std::fill(m_waveSum.begin(), m_waveSum.end(), 0.0);
00477         std::fill(m_darkPSDSum.begin(), m_darkPSDSum.end(), 0.0);
00478         m_avcount = 0;
00479         if(*exAvgIncr()) {
00480             extraAvg()->value(0);
00481         }
00482     }
00483 
00484     if(skip) {
00485         throw XSkippedRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00486     }
00487 
00488     m_dsoWave.resize(_dso->lengthRecorded());
00489     {
00490         const double *rawwavecos, *rawwavesin = NULL;
00491         ASSERT( _dso->numChannelsRecorded() );
00492         rawwavecos = _dso->waveRecorded(0);
00493         rawwavesin = _dso->waveRecorded(1);
00494         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < _dso->lengthRecorded(); i++) {
00495             m_dsoWave[i] = std::complex<double>(rawwavecos[i], rawwavesin[i]) * (inverted ? -1.0 : 1.0);
00496         }
00497     }
00498     m_dsoWaveStartPos = pos;
00499 
00500     //background subtraction or dynamic noise reduction
00501     if(bg_after_last_echo)
00502         backgroundSub(m_dsoWave, pos, length, bgpos, bglength);
00503     for(int i = 1; i < numechoes; i++) {
00504         int rpos = pos + i * echoperiod;
00505         for(int j = 0;
00506         j < (!bg_after_last_echo ? std::max(bgpos + bglength, length) : length); j++) {
00507             int k = rpos + j;
00508             ASSERT(k < (int)_dso->lengthRecorded());
00509             if(i == 1)
00510                 m_dsoWave[pos + j] /= (double)numechoes;
00511             m_dsoWave[pos + j] += m_dsoWave[k] / (double)numechoes;
00512         }
00513     }
00514     //background subtraction or dynamic noise reduction
00515     if(!bg_after_last_echo)
00516         backgroundSub(m_dsoWave, pos, length, bgpos, bglength);
00517 
00518     //Incremental/Sequential average.
00519     if((emitter == _dso) || (!m_avcount)) { 
00520         for(int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
00521             m_waveSum[i] += m_dsoWave[pos + i];
00522         }
00523         {
00524             //Estimate power spectral density of dark side.
00525             if(!m_ftDark || (m_ftDark->length() != m_darkPSD.size())) {
00526                 m_ftDark.reset(new FFT(-1, *fftLen()));
00527             }
00528             std::vector<std::complex<double> > darkin(fftlen, 0.0), darkout(fftlen);
00529             int bginplen = std::min(bglength, fftlen);
00530             double normalize = 0.0;
00531             //Twist background not to be affected by the dc subtraction.
00532             for(int i = 0; i < bginplen; i++) {
00533                 double tw = sin(2.0*M_PI*i/(double)bginplen);
00534                 darkin[i] = m_dsoWave[pos + i + bgpos] * tw;
00535                 normalize += tw * tw;
00536             }
00537             normalize = 1.0 / normalize * interval;
00538             m_ftDark->exec(darkin, darkout);
00539             //Convolution for the rectangular window.
00540             for(int i = 0; i < fftlen; i++) {
00541                 darkin[i] = std::norm(darkout[i]) * normalize;
00542             }
00543             m_ftDark->exec(darkin, darkout); //FT of PSD.
00544             std::vector<std::complex<double> > sigma2(darkout);
00545             std::fill(darkin.begin(), darkin.end(), 0.0);
00546             double x = sqrt(1.0 / length / fftlen);
00547             for(int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
00548                 darkin[i] = x;
00549             }
00550             m_ftDark->exec(darkin, darkout); //FT of rect. window.
00551             for(int i = 0; i < fftlen; i++) {
00552                 darkin[i] = std::norm(darkout[i]);
00553             }
00554             m_ftDark->exec(darkin, darkout); //FT of norm of (FT of rect. window). 
00555             for(int i = 0; i < fftlen; i++) {
00556                 darkin[i] = std::conj(darkout[i] * sigma2[i]);
00557             }
00558             m_ftDark->exec(darkin, darkout); //Convolution.
00559             normalize = 1.0 / fftlen;
00560             for(int i = 0; i < fftlen; i++) {
00561                 m_darkPSDSum[i] += std::real(darkout[i]) * normalize; //[V^2/Hz]
00562             }
00563         }
00564         m_avcount++;
00565         if(*exAvgIncr()) {
00566             extraAvg()->value(m_avcount);
00567         }
00568     }
00569     double normalize = 1.0 / m_avcount;
00570     for(int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
00571         m_wave[i] = m_waveSum[i] * normalize;
00572     }
00573     double darknormalize = normalize * normalize;
00574     if(bg_after_last_echo)
00575         darknormalize /= (double)numechoes;
00576     for(int i = 0; i < fftlen; i++) {
00577         m_darkPSD[i] = m_darkPSDSum[i] * darknormalize;
00578     }
00579     int ftpos = lrint(*fftPos() * 1e-3 / interval + _dso->trigPosRecorded() - pos);
00580 
00581     if(*difFreq() != 0.0) {
00582         //Digital IF.
00583         double omega = -2.0 * M_PI * *difFreq() * 1e3 * interval;
00584         for(int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
00585             m_wave[i] *= std::polar(1.0, omega * (i - ftpos));
00586         }
00587     }
00588 
00589     //  if((windowfunc != &windowFuncRect) && (abs(ftpos - length/2) > length*0.1))
00590     //      m_statusPrinter->printWarning(i18n("FFTPos is off-centered for window func."));
00591     double ph = *phaseAdv() * M_PI / 180;
00592     m_waveFTPos = ftpos;
00593     //[Hz]
00594     m_dFreq = 1.0 / fftlen / interval;
00595     m_ftWave.resize(fftlen);
00596     m_solverRecorded = m_solver->solver();
00597 
00598     rotNFFT(ftpos, ph, m_wave, m_ftWave);   
00599     if(m_solverRecorded->peaks().size()) {
00600         entryPeakAbs()->value(m_solverRecorded->peaks()[0].first / (double)m_wave.size());
00601         double x = m_solverRecorded->peaks()[0].second;
00602         x = (x > fftlen / 2) ? (x - fftlen) : x;
00603         entryPeakFreq()->value(0.001 * x * m_dFreq);
00604     }
00605     
00606     if(picenabled && (m_avcount % 2 == 1) && (emitter == _dso)) {
00607         ASSERT( _pulser->time() );
00608         unlockConnection(_pulser);
00609         _pulser->invertPhase()->value(!inverted);
00610     }
00611     if(!*exAvgIncr() && (avgnum != m_avcount))
00612         throw XSkippedRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00613 }
00614 void XNMRPulseAnalyzer::visualize() {
00615     if (!time() || !m_avcount) {
00616         ftWaveGraph()->clear();
00617         waveGraph()->clear();
00618         m_peakPlot->maxCount()->value(0);
00619         return;
00620     }
00621 
00622     int ftsize = m_ftWave.size();
00623     {
00624         XScopedWriteLock<XWaveNGraph> lock(*ftWaveGraph());
00625         ftWaveGraph()->setRowCount(ftsize);
00626         double normalize = 1.0 / m_wave.size();
00627         double darknormalize = m_ftWavePSDCoeff / (m_wave.size() * interval());
00628         for (int i = 0; i < ftsize; i++) {
00629             int j = (i - ftsize/2 + ftsize) % ftsize;
00630             ftWaveGraph()->cols(0)[i] = 0.001 * (i - ftsize/2) * m_dFreq;
00631             std::complex<double> z = m_ftWave[j] * normalize;
00632             ftWaveGraph()->cols(1)[i] = std::real(z);
00633             ftWaveGraph()->cols(2)[i] = std::imag(z);
00634             ftWaveGraph()->cols(3)[i] = std::abs(z);
00635             ftWaveGraph()->cols(4)[i] = std::arg(z) / M_PI * 180;
00636             ftWaveGraph()->cols(5)[i] = sqrt(m_darkPSD[j] * darknormalize);
00637         }
00638         m_peakPlot->maxCount()->value(m_solverRecorded->peaks().size());
00639         std::deque<XGraph::ValPoint> &points(m_peakPlot->points());
00640         points.resize(m_solverRecorded->peaks().size());
00641         for(int i = 0; i < m_solverRecorded->peaks().size(); i++) {
00642             double x = m_solverRecorded->peaks()[i].second;
00643             x = (x > ftsize / 2) ? (x - ftsize) : x;
00644             points[i] = XGraph::ValPoint(0.001 * x * m_dFreq,
00645                 m_solverRecorded->peaks()[i].first * normalize);
00646         }
00647     }
00648     {
00649         int length = m_dsoWave.size();
00650         XScopedWriteLock<XWaveNGraph> lock(*waveGraph());
00651         waveGraph()->setRowCount(length);
00652         for (int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
00653             int j = i - m_dsoWaveStartPos;
00654             waveGraph()->cols(0)[i] = (startTime() + j * m_interval) * 1e3;
00655             if(abs(j) < ftsize / 2) {
00656                 j = (j - m_waveFTPos + ftsize) % ftsize;
00657                 waveGraph()->cols(1)[i] = std::real(m_solverRecorded->ifft()[j]);
00658                 waveGraph()->cols(2)[i] = std::imag(m_solverRecorded->ifft()[j]);
00659             }
00660             else {
00661                 waveGraph()->cols(1)[i] = 0.0;
00662                 waveGraph()->cols(2)[i] = 0.0;              
00663             }
00664             waveGraph()->cols(3)[i] = m_dsoWave[i].real();
00665             waveGraph()->cols(4)[i] = m_dsoWave[i].imag();              
00666         }
00667     }
00668 }
